items.content_html: SimpleStatCounter is a lightweight JavaScript class designed to create seamless numeric counting animations for elements as they come into view. This class harnesses the power of the Intersection Observer API, making it efficient and performant.

This class harnesses the power of the Intersection Observer API, making it efficient and performant.

items.content_html: NowTS is a lightweight and modular TypeScript library for date and time manipulation. It provides a range of utilities for formatting, parsing, and calculating date differences, with support for multiple time zones.
